column5: I'm making molds right now from some rubber gloves. https://windsor.ctvnews.ca/windsor-ironman-triathlete-recounts-mistaken-muskie-attack-in-lake-st-clair-1.5549178

Not surprised! We were on L St Clair that same day with some friends. Between 4 boats I think close to 30 muskies were caught (when you lose track you know it is a lot of fish!). Never thought of trolling a rubber glove but it may have paid off that day!
Good thing he wasnt skinny dippin! Lol! Ouch!
They can get feisty when you stick hooks in them too
my back yard. the muskies are hungry,ornery critters.
Ya suppose fingers could like little minners swimming around or fleeing a human.  A muskies mistaken identity for what it thought was an appetizer..
